title: Exhausting AF sometimes.....
selftext:
Start having an opinion people !!!! 
As humans these opinions will also evolve and change over time but high time we had some !
comments: Apolitical or NOTA defaults to government in power.
Daumn....didn't know that. Thanks kind stranger.

But bro, me and my family are not getting affected by anything, why should we care?/s


Also, isn't politics bad?/s


Also also, do you know how bad things are in Pakistan?/s
